import React, { useState } from 'react' import loginIcon from '../assest/signin.gif' import { IoEye } from "react-icons/io5"; import { IoIosEyeOff } from "react-icons/io"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Login = () => { const [ShowPassword, SetshowPassword] = useState(false); const [data,setdata]=useState({ email:'', password:'' }) const handleOnchange=(e) => { const {name, value} = e.target setdata((preve)) } return (
SetshowPassword((preve)=>!preve)}> { ShowPassword ? () : () }

) } export default Login
